channel.title: Ideas on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in Ideas on Ian Wootten

item.title: The Developer Dream
item.description: I suffer from idea overload. It seems that every day I have an idea for something. As a developer, I’m lucky in that to be able to take an idea to inception very quickly. Best of all, I can show it at inception stage to a huge audience (if I had one), garner feedback and quickly iterate on that idea. To date, I’ve mainly created these by myself – a casualty of doing paid work in the main like this too.

item.title: Sharing too much?
item.description: I’ve heard a couple of rumours this evening that google may be launching a facebook app that allows your friends to see your search trends over time via your facebook mini feed. There’s some discussion over on facereviews.com that anything like this exists, but for me it raises an interesting question about how much information people are willing to share within their own “social networks”. Would I be comfortable with everyone knowing what I was searching for?
